description: Uswatte Liyanage Wijayananda Perera  and  others  Vs  Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Uswatte Liyanage Wijayananda Perera  and  others  Vs  Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Whether the appellants have been denied a fair trial? – Whether it is a fit case to order a re-trial? – Successor and Predecessor Judges – Demeanour and deportment of the prosecution witnesses.
legistation: - Sections 32, 140, 146, 296 and 300 of the Penal Code. - Sections 200(1) and 283 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act No. 15 of 1979.
